cms_page.title: Adella Home Version 5
cms_page.content:
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="adella_vertical_menu"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\Deals" title="Hot deals" custom_class="navigation-top-right" product_id="12,11,10,9" per_row="1" slider_mode="1" slider_control="1"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\ProductList" title="weekly featured" custom_class="navigation-top-right" view_mode="mode_list" type_list="new" category_id="category/6" slider_mode_grid="1" per_row_grid="1" number_show="12"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="promo_the_trendy_sidebar_light" template="banner.phtml"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Testimonial\Block\Widget\Testimonial" title="Testimonials" number_of_posts="5" show_thumbnail="1" show_nav="1" show_dots="0" custom_class="testimonial-mode-base navigation-top-right"}}
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="adella_product_tags"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\Slider" block_id="adella_slider_home_12" banner_height="475" animate="1" banner_owl_auto="1" banner_owl_speed="6000" banner_owl_dot="1" banner_owl_loop="1"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="promo_the_biggest_light12" template="banner.phtml"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="promo_men_collection_light12" template="banner.phtml"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\ProductList" title="Featured products" custom_class="navigation-top-right border-title sidebar-nav" view_mode="mode_grid" type_list="attribute" attribute_filter_list="featured_product" slider_mode_grid="1" per_row_grid="4" number_show="12"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Promobanners\Block\Widget\Banner" banner_id="14" template="banner.phtml"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\ProductList" title="New products" custom_class="navigation-top-right border-title sidebar-nav" view_mode="mode_grid" type_list="new" category_id="category/3" slider_mode_grid="1" per_row_grid="4" number_show="12"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\ProductList" title="Best seller" custom_class="navigation-top-right border-title sidebar-nav" view_mode="mode_grid" type_list="sale" slider_mode_grid="1" per_row_grid="4" number_show="12"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Blog\Block\Widget\Lastest" title="Latest From Blog" number_of_posts="10" show_thumbnail="1" thumbnail_width="240" thumbnail_height="180" show_short_content="1" limit_characters_short_content="100" view_as="owl_carousel" custom_class="navigation-top-right border-title blog-viewmode-base sidebar-nav" items="3" navigation="1" template="widget/default.phtml"}}
{{widget type="MGS\Brand\Block\Widget\Brand" brand_ids="1,2,3,4,7,8,9,10,11,12,13,14,15" view_as="owl_carousel" items="5" image_width="136" image_height="46" autoplay="1" stop_on_hover="1" template="widget/default.phtml"}}
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="adella_freeshipping_center"}}
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="adella_money_center"}}
{{widget type="Magento\Cms\Block\Widget\Block" template="widget/static_block/default.phtml" block_id="adella_support_center"}}
